item_details.this_item_has_been_sent_to_:
This item has been sent to the municipality for processing.
                                    Current status:
language_selection.try_speaking_in_your_: Try speaking in your selected language
listing_form.by_listing_this_item_you_ag:
By listing this item, you agree to make it available for pickup or collection
                        by interested parties. Your contact information will be visible to other users.
marketplace.list_your_recyclable_items_h:
List your recyclable items here for others to claim or browse items to find
                            materials you can reuse. Plastic items are automatically forwarded to the
                            municipality for raw material processing.
marketplace.browse_recyclable_items_avai:
Browse recyclable items available for pickup or connect with others
            looking for materials to reuse in creative ways.
municipality.view_items_that_have_been_s:
View items that have been sent to the municipal recycling program, 
            particularly plastic materials that can be used as raw materials in construction.
municipality.the_municipality_program_fo:
The municipality program focuses on collecting plastic waste that can be 
                            processed into raw materials for construction and other public works. 
                            Plastic items that are recyclable are automatically forwarded here.
municipality.when_plastic_items_are_list:
When plastic items are listed in the marketplace, they will be automatically routed
                        to the municipality for processing into raw materials.
report_infrastructure.help_improve_your_:
Help improve your community by reporting damaged infrastructure. Take a photo using your webcam
                or upload an image file to report issues like damaged roads, streetlights, etc.
report_infrastructure.for_emergencies_or:
For emergencies or hazardous situations requiring immediate attention, 
                        please also contact local emergency services directly.
waste_tracking.track_the_journey_of_your:
Track the journey of your waste item from drop-off to recycling completion.
                Our blockchain-like system ensures transparency and integrity throughout the process.
waste_tracking.in_a_realworld_scenario_s:
In a real-world scenario, stages would be added automatically by authorized entities throughout the recycling process.
                        This form is for demonstration purposes only.
waste_verification.this_page_allows_anyo:
This page allows anyone to verify the authenticity and traceability of waste items in our system.
                The blockchain-like system ensures transparency and integrity throughout the recycling process.
common.try_speaking_in_your_selected_lan: Try speaking in your selected language
